articles.articleTitle: Mahomes Throws 4 TDs in Chiefs Win
articles.bodyText: Patrick Mahomes led the Chiefs with four touchdown passes, securing a dominant victory over their division rivals.

articles.articleTitle: McCaffrey Racks Up 150 Yards Against Rams
articles.bodyText: Christian McCaffrey showcased his versatility with 150 all-purpose yards as the 49ers defeated the Rams in a close matchup.

articles.articleTitle: Allen Leads Bills Comeback in Overtime
articles.bodyText: Josh Allen threw a game-winning touchdown in overtime to lift the Bills past the Dolphins in a thrilling AFC East clash.

articles.articleTitle: Smith crumbles in crushing Seahawk's defeat
articles.bodyText: Geno Smith threw two passing interceptions over the course of this division game, leading the Seahawks to a loss of 6 to 23
